TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE

Alarm System Panels. 
Make: EST, Siemens, Notifier, GST, BOSCH, Cooper system, Ravel system,

Access Control System:  Biometric based Access control system Installation,

based Access Control System, Optical Barrier, Turnstile, Access Controllers are

CCTV System:  Thorough Knowledge in CCTV system such as installation,

controller
